name: competence-wp
description: Example block scaffolded with Create Block tool.
author: The WordPress Contributors

scripts.merge-blocks: cp -rp ./build/* ./competence-wp/ && cp src/block-eleve/block.json ./competence-wp/block-eleve && cp src/block-login/block.json ./competence-wp/block-login && cp competence-wp.php ./competence-wp/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-shared && webpack --config webpack.config.js && npm run merge-blocks && npm run generate-manifest && npm run zip
